name: Rocketship vs Spaceships
description:
The game is pretty self-explanatory with the ships and the controls in the game are

Left arrow - move left, Right arrow - move right, Down arrow - move down, Up arrow - move up

Spacebar - shoot bullet/laser (laser powerup), C - Beam wave power up

That's pretty much it for the game see you guys' next year and have a great Christmas and a Happy New Years.
